name: Elysian Tactical Laser
customPrimary: Laser that can disrupt phased ships and defend against missiles
customAncillary: The laser will have a %s chance to disable a phase system when passing over a phased ship. Increases phase cooldown onhit.

name: Elysian Energy Blaster S
customPrimary: Energy beam that when fully charged launches an explosive projectile. The projectile does %s explosive damage on a radius.

name: Elysian Energy Blaster M
customPrimary: Energy beam that when fully charged launches an explosive projectile. The projectile does %s explosive damage on a radius.

name: Elysian Energy Blaster L
customPrimary: Energy beam that when fully charged launches an explosive projectile. The projectile does 3000 explosive damage on a radius.

name: Elysian Energy Devastator
customPrimary: Energy beam that when fully charged launches a shotgun of explosive projectiles. The projectiles do %s explosive damage and %s EMP on a radius.
customAncillary: Fires 3 projectiles in a wide range.
